hero.tagline: The place where bold coffee meets good vibes

menu.title: OUR MENU
menu.description: Discover our carefully crafted selection of coffee drinks, made with locally sourced beans and served with passion.
menu.espresso_desc: A rich, concentrated shot of pure coffee perfection
menu.cappuccino_desc: Equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and frothy foam
menu.latte_desc: Smooth espresso blended with steamed milk, topped with light foam
menu.mocha_desc: Espresso with a chocolate twist, topped with whipped cream
menu.iced_americano_desc: Refreshing espresso diluted with chilled water
menu.cold_brew_desc: Smooth, slow-steeped coffee served over ice
